name: NSSharingServicePickerTouchBarItem
desc: A bar item that, along with its delegate, provides a list of objects eligible for sharing.

items.name: var delegate: NSSharingServicePickerTouchBarItemDelegate?
items.desc: The object that acts as the delegate of the sharing service picker bar item.

items.name: protocol NSSharingServicePickerTouchBarItemDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that a sharing service picker item delegate uses to provide a list of items eligible for sharing.

items.name: var buttonImage: NSImage?
items.desc: The image displayed in the sharing service picker item button.

items.name: var buttonTitle: String
items.desc: The text displayed in the sharing service picker item button.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the sharing service picker item is enabled.
